patch.title: The Legend of Zelda: Masked Quest
patch.tooltip: A Master Quest style romhack for Majora's Mask, offering a higher difficulty{0}The patch contains major changes to where progress is obtained throughout the overworld and dungeons{0}Includes some of the changes featured in the Redux / Randomizer patches like D-Pad support{0}- Supported: Rev 0 (US)
